mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring.product (prod_id, evt_gp_id, prod_img_id, cat_code, prod_name, prod_price, rate, sale_sts, prod_qty, is_opt, disp_sts, rev_num, prod_rg_date, prod_mode_date, sel_str_date, sel_end_date) VALUES (#{prod_id}, #{evt_gp_id}, #{prod_img_id}, #{cat_code}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_price}, #{rate}, #{sale_sts}, #{prod_qty}, #{is_opt}, #{disp_sts}, #{rev_num}, #{prod_rg_date}, #{prod_mode_date}, #{sel_str_date}, #{sel_end_date})
